snippet: An informal survey reveals opposition to a plan to locate the unidentified remains of Sept. 11 victims at bedrock in the National Sept. 11 Memorial & Museum.
abstract: An informal survey reveals opposition to a plan to locate the unidentified remains of Sept. 11 victims at bedrock in the National Sept. 11 Memorial & Museum.

headline.main: Plan to Place 9/11 Victims' Remains at Bedrock Continues to Stir Outrage
headline.print_headline: Families Continue Protest Of Plan for 9/11 Remains
